name: Mad Dog II
description:
Following the events of the first Mad Dog, our titular character must favor a cloak and dagger approach to infiltrate various locals spanning across the world in order to uncover the ones responsible for the television show from hell - Fight for Freedom. 

But don't worry, if stealth isn't your thing, feel free to blast your way through each level, dodging bullets, lasers, and anything else the mysterious Sweet Tooth has gunning for you.

Featuring over ten levels, multiple endings, and plenty of hardware to shock and incapacitate our fellow man. What are you waiting for? Stop reading play my game already!
